text: Kaitaia is a town in the Far North District of the North Island. It is about 160 kilometers northwest of WhangƒÅrei and is the last major town on the way to Cape Reinga on State Highway 1. It has 7 schools including Kaitaia College. It has a warm climate in New Zealand and suffers from frequent droughts in the 2009/10 and 2019/20 summers. It thrives on wine and honey industry and beef farming. ==References== Category:Towns in Northland Region Category:Far North District
title: Kaitaia
